attributes.action: require Basildon Council to provide a suitable alternative site for the families at Dale Farm.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be no move by Basildon Council to evict the families presently living at Dale Farm unless and until they have provided a suitable replacement site for them. Just because the residents are travelling families does not mean they are without human rights and deserving of our compassion and assistance at their time of need.
